message.body: She looks so cute in her marm dress!
Thanks
How was the first day?
Is moms phone off ?
Yup
She loved it. First day is always fun

I just wanted to let you know before you hear it from anybody else who blows up the dramatic story that Poppie is okay but he is in the hospital. The infection in his leg got pretty bad. They are keeping him doped up so he sleeping mostly when he's awake he's a little disoriented and confused. At this point we think that he'll be able to come home within the next couple weeks But not certain. I will keep you posted if anything happens where his condition deteriorates
Oh man thank you. I'm gonna call dad now.
Should I come down you think?
No Not at this point.

It's been up-and-down on what they think the prognosis is whether he'll be able to come home and have a nurse take care of him or go to a nursing facility or if we should prepare for the worst they've kind of been all over the board so I don't want to tell you to come down when we don't really know yet
When he was awake he knew who we all were he asked about Iliana so he's aware
Ok. Dad was working with the nurses he's gonna call me back
Ok.
I think he's just confused because he's been asleep in the hospital basically since We had him admitted on Wednesday
But they're keeping him medicated for a reason when he's not medicated he's restless and he's not able to heal the way that he should
Yeah and if he's on meds it can really knock you out.
Yeah. Oh man
Is there anything I can do?
There really isn't I will let you know if anything changes
Okay. If you talk to dad remind him to call me.
Ok
